mapper.select: select (@i:=@i+1)AS id,info.* from (select d.dname,j.jname,e.ename,e.esex,m.eddate,m.edtype from t_emp e LEFT JOIN t_dept d on e.dno=d.dno LEFT JOIN t_job j on e.jno=j.jno LEFT JOIN t_emp_dimission m on e.eno = m.eno where m.eddate BETWEEN #{begin} and #{end}) info,(select @i:=0) AS id
